metadata.dc:author: Solares Cambres, J
Montes Santiago, J
Andreu García, A
López Aramburu, M A
metadata.dc:description: A case of renal metastasis from lung epidermoid carcinoma with florid clinic is presented. We point out the great diagnostic help obtained by using Computerized Axial Tomography (C.A.T.) and echo-monitored fine needle aspiration puncture (F.N.A.P.).
metadata.dc:title: Metástasis renal por carcinoma epidermoide de pulmón.
[Renal metastasis caused by an epidermoid carcinoma of the lung].
